words: Sara l’awentuchefe ngey ka kimelfe ngey

translation: Sara is a doctor and a teacher.

gloss: Pablo doctor COP-neg-3 only(CON) receive-person-AGENT-VBLZ-3

gloss: Pablo doctor COP-PE-3 CON Juan perhaps doctor COP
translation: (Either) Pablo is a doctor or Juan is a doctor.
